template: {name} has {a} apples. They buy {b} more. How many apples does {name} have now?
A taxi charges a base fare of {a} rupees plus {b} rupees per kilometer. If the total fare for a {d} km journey is {total}, how many kilometers did the passenger travel?
In a magic garden every {x}th flower blooms twice as many petals as the previous. If the function of petals is described by {expr}, what is the number of petals at position x?
A projectile thrown upward has height modeled by h(t) = {expr}. When will the projectile hit the ground (h=0)?
A parabolic reflector shaped by y = {expr} focuses light at its vertex. Find the vertex and explain where the focus would be.

The temperature T(t) of a chemical increases according to T(t) = {expr}. What is the instantaneous rate of change of temperature at time t={val}?
Water fills a tank with inflow rate r(t) = {expr} liters/hour. How much water enters during the first {T} hours?
A ladder leans against a wall forming angle θ with the ground. If the top height is given by h(θ) = {expr}, find the height when θ={val} degrees.

Position of a car is s(t) = {expr}. What is its velocity and acceleration at time t={t}?
The temperature difference is modeled by f(x) = {expr}. For which x does the temperature difference equal zero?
A potion requires mixing metals such that mass satisfies {expr}. Solve for the feasible masses.
A wave has displacement y(x,t) = {expr}. What is displacement at position x={x0} and time t={t0}?
A cone's volume is V = {expr}. If the height is {h} and radius r, find r when V = {Vval}.

The feasible region for production is given by {expr}. For which x is the constraint satisfied?
The probability of k successes is given by P(k) = {expr}. What is P when k={kval}?
A curve is parameterized by x(t) = {exprx}, y(t) = {expry}. Find the slope dy/dx at t={t0}.
Explain in plain words what the derivative of f(x) = {expr} tells us about the quantity modeled by x.
An item priced at {p} rupees is discounted by {d}%. What is the sale price?

An amount P grows with compound interest compounded {n} times per year at rate r. Write formula and compute after t years.
Mixing solutions: {a} liters at concentration {c1}% mixed with {b} liters at {c2}%. What is final concentration?

A dataset has values described by {expr}. Compute mean and variance for n samples.

A discrete variable has PMF p(k) = {expr}. What is E[K]?
Given matrix A = {expr}, compute determinant and eigenvalues.
Solve the differential equation dy/dt + p(t) y = q(t) for given p(t) and q(t) when y(0) = y0.
Maximize f(x,y) = {expr} subject to constraint g(x,y) = {constraint}. Find stationary points.

For a circuit with voltage V and resistance R where V = {expr}, compute current and power.
Concentration changes according to C(t) = {expr}. What is concentration after t={t}?
